channel.title: Rewarding for help with drops turning off [devo]
channel.description: Please somebody post a working fix for drops turning off for devo 2.7 and I will reward you greatly.

item.title: Rewarding for help with drops turning off [devo]
item.dc:creator: @short_asian_kid short_asian_kid
item.description:
@short_asian_kid wrote:

if(command.startsWith("onpickup") && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith("pickupon") && playerRights > 1){ talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items enabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods)."); server.pickup = true; } if(command.startsWith("offpickup") && playerRights > 0 || command.startsWith("pickupoff") && playerRights > 1){ talk("["+playerName+"] - picking up items disabled (::onpickup, ::offpickup for mods)."); server.pickup = false; }

Read full topic
item.source: Rewarding for help with drops turning off [devo]
